Posts.Content: lynnwad Definitely we will keep in touch I went for mammogram, ultra sound & biopsy on 23rd April & doc told me then he thought it was breast cancer & I had to go back a week later 3rd May for confirmation & was at chemo clinic yesterday. 1st chemo 16th. I'm like you can't believe it's happening to me & why me ? But it is & its do or die so no choice but we will get thru this together .... Cold cap here we come !! I was thinking bout getting a wig so if u go out for say tea for an hr & u can't do anything with yr hair u cld pop wig on to at least look tidy ? Going to look at some next week I'll let u know how it goes keep strong ❤️ X
Posts.Title: What can I expect from 1st chemo I'm terrified of the Unknown
